summary: AN ORDINANCE adopting the 2003 Update to The City of Seattle 2001-2004 Consolidated Plan for Housing and Community Development, including general policies for the use of the City's funding resources for housing and amendments to the City's Citizen Participation Plan for the Consolidated Plan; authorizing the submission of the 2003 Update to the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; authorizing the Human Services Director to make changes to the Plan for certain purposes; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
committee: Housing, Human Services and Community Development
